about_the_game:
Welcome to You are Kaiju. This game involves you the player rampaging through cities and causing chaos. Breath fire and fire plasma beams from your hands. Try to get the highest score through the levels.
The mechanics in this game are as follows:
The Player Can: Breath Fire, Fire Plasma beams from both hands, pickup cars and bash them against buildings.
There are cars that drive around, citizens that will walk around, and tanks that will try to lower the players score.
detailed_description:
Welcome to You are Kaiju. This game involves you the player rampaging through cities and causing chaos. Breath fire and fire plasma beams from your hands. Try to get the highest score through the levels.
The mechanics in this game are as follows:
The Player Can: Breath Fire, Fire Plasma beams from both hands, pickup cars and bash them against buildings.
There are cars that drive around, citizens that will walk around, and tanks that will try to lower the players score.
name: You Are Kaiju

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better; AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or FX 8350, or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or better; AMD Radeon RX 470 or better.
  • VR Support: Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better; AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better; AMD Radeon RX 480 or better.

short_description: Welcome to You are Kaiju. A rampage vr game where you the player will destroy cities to get a good score. Be careful though. There are tanks that will try to lower your score. Have fun by breathing fire and firing plasma beams from your hands.
